name: Bee in chaos
description:
Created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 edition. Please note that this is our first completed gamejam game, and due to having a work life it was completed in 3 days.

Bee in chaos is a single level platformer game where you control an overweight bee trying to find his love, but little did he know that his life wass about to turn upside down (pun included)!

Controls:

- Move: AD, or Arrow keys
- Dash: Left Control:
- Jump: Space

If you try it out let us know! Any feedback is appreciated!

Cheers,
